articles.title: If You'd Invested $10,000 in Verizon Communications 10 Years Ago, Here's How Much You'd Have Today
articles.mainIdea: If You'd Invested $10,000 in Verizon Communications 10 Years Ago, Here's How Much You'd Have Today
articles.summary: Motley Fool: If You'd Invested $10,000 in Verizon Communications 10 Years Ago, Here's How Much You'd Have Today. Verizon was a market-beater 10 years ago. The next decade told a very different story. Related tickers mentioned: AAPL, VZ, ^GSPC.

articles.title: Will Kodiak Collaboration Strengthen Verizon's Growth Prospects?
articles.mainIdea: Will Kodiak Collaboration Strengthen Verizon's Growth Prospects?
articles.summary: Zacks: Will Kodiak Collaboration Strengthen Verizon's Growth Prospects?. VZ teams up with Kodiak AI to bring 5G and IoT to autonomous trucks, enabling safer, smarter, and more connected freight operations. Related tickers mentioned: T, T-PA, VZ.

articles.title: Will Partnership With Sovato Boost T's Prospects in Digital Health?
articles.mainIdea: Will Partnership With Sovato Boost T's Prospects in Digital Health?
articles.summary: Zacks: Will Partnership With Sovato Boost T's Prospects in Digital Health?. AT&T teams up with Sovato to expand digital healthcare access, combining 5G and cloud tools for virtual care in remote areas. Related tickers mentioned: T, T-PA, VZ.
